abstract: Second round at Honda Classic golf tournament is suspended because of darkness, with low round of the day going to Brooks Koepka, while world's No-1 golfer Rory McIlroy is projected to miss the cut after rare poor outing.
lead_paragraph: In his American season debut at the Honda Classic, McIlroy finished three strokes outside the projected cut line on Friday. But Brooks Koepka, a Palm Beach County native, had the low round of the day.

headline.main: As a Local Favorite Rises, Rory McIlroy Will Take an Unexpected Weekend Off
headline.print_headline: As a Local Favorite Rises, McIlroy Will Take an Unexpected Weekend Off
